nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Slaves of the Republic

Slaves of the Republic was the first story arc of the comic series Star Wars: The Clone Wars. The story was written by Henry Gilroy, the head writer for the first season of the television show. The arc ran for six issues from September 10, 2008 to May 13, 2009.
The story arc was later adapted in the Season Four episodes "Kidnapped," "Slaves of the Republic," and "Escape from Kadavo."

The Confederacy of Independent Systems negotiated with the Togruta colonists on the planet Kiros. The people would be removed for their safety during the Clone Wars. When the Grand Army of the Republic invades the planet days later, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and his Padawan, Ahsoka Tano, are confronted with the mystery of the missing Togrutas. After defeating the Separatist commander, they capture a smuggling ship and use it to infiltrate the planet Zygerria. There they discover the Togrutas have been sold as slaves.

Anakin became the queen's consort to save his Padawan, who was captured and sold to Kiros, where her people were taken. The queen tries to betray the Separatists and is cut down. Skywalker then saves the Togrutas from certain death from the slave masters.
